title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4L.03 - Warning Beacon
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 4L.03 - Warning Beacon

State Regulations
INSERT the following paragraph: Standard: 08A If used with a WHEN FLASHING (NYR7-13P, NYR7-13aP)
plaque (see sign drawing SD-R11), Warning Beacons shall be operated only when
the condition or regulation is in effect. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
4L.03

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
